DataElement.preferredName: Edmonton Frail Scale 4 Activities that Require Help Score 3 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation about how many activities required help, using a 3 point scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Edmonton Frail Scale Activities that Require Help Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An assessment tool designed to be used by clinicians to assess the frailty of older patients. It assesses 10 domains including cognitive impairment and balance and mobility._A question about the activities that an individual did or does require help to do._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An assessment tool designed to be used by clinicians to assess the frailty of older patients. It assesses 10 domains including cognitive impairment and balance and mobility.

Concepts.definition: An assessment tool designed to be used by clinicians to assess the frailty of older patients. It assesses 10 domains including cognitive impairment and balance and mobility.

Property.preferredDefinition: A question about the activities that an individual did or does require help to do.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A question about the activities that an individual did or does require help to do.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Zero or One Activity Required Help

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Zero or One Activity Required Help
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had 0 or 1 activities that required help.

Concepts.longName: Zero or One Activity Required Help
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had 0 or 1 activities that required help.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Two to Four Activities Required Help

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Two to Four Activities Required Help
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had 2-4 activities that required help.

Concepts.longName: Two to Four Activities Required Help
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had 2-4 activities that required help.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Five to Eight Activities Required Help

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Five to Eight Activities Required Help
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had 5-8 activities that required help.

Concepts.longName: Five to Eight Activities Required Help
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had 5-8 activities that required help.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: With how many of the followin
ReferenceDocuments.description: With how many of the following activities do you require help? (meal preparation, shopping, transportation, telephone, housekeeping, laundry, managing money, taking medications)

DataElement.origin: EFS:Edmonton Frail Scale; Rolfson et al., Validity and Reliability of the Edmonton Frail Scale, Age Ageing 2006; Sep Epub 2006
